mapper.sql: Noticeid, Title, Notice, Stype, UpdateIP, UpdateDate, State, SupUserName, OffType, Attribute1, Attribute2
mapper.select:
select
from notice_info where offtype = #{offtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY updatedate DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert:
